comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Dr. James Edward West (May 16, 1876 – May 15, 1948) was a lawyer and an advocate of children's rights, who became the first professional Executive Secretary, soon renamed Chief Scout Executive, of the Boy Scouts of America (BSA), serving from 1911 to 1943" en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_E._West_%28Scouting%29 See photograph in Williston graphic., May 30, 1918, Page 12 See also The Ogden standard., November 13, 1915, 4 P.M. CITY EDITION, MAGAZINE SECTION, Page 20

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for the additional info. on West.  We will include some of it next time we update.
